response.overview: Elvira Tittmann, our busty lady of the house, manages to welcome bum Paul into the family circle with an integration grant of 3000 euros and by hiring the attractive household help Lenka. As a thank-you, the scumbag immediately makes a pass at Elisabett Tittmann, the big-titted sister of the landlord Karl-Heinz, who already has more than one eye on the new cleaning helper. Meanwhile, his stupidly horny son Bodo opens the door to bimbo Cathy B. to be juiced by the plump-chested slut. Meanwhile, our house mistress Elvira looks after master craftsman Erik Allesknner more intensively and intimately than necessary. In the evening, Karl-Heinz meets up with his buddy Eberhard, who has just had a horny sex adventure with curbside swallow Jutta. The men arrange to meet up with the women. It's always going to be exciting, friends.
response.title: Willkommen bei den Tittmanns 2
